otherNames: Bastard!!: Ankoku no Hakaishin, Bastard!! Destroyer of Darkness, Ankoku no Hakai Kami, バスタード!! 暗黒の破壊神
synopsis: Several hundred years after Anthrasax destroyed modern civilization, a group of four lords plans to set this old god free once again. To prevent this from happening, a former ally of the four is released from his 15 year imprisonment. Dark Schneider, a sorcerer who once tried to conquer the world, now fights to save it.
